description: [OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0352) encrypts data sent back to the C2 using AES in CBC mode with a null initialization vector (IV) and a key sent from the server that is padded to 32 bytes.(Citation: Unit42 OceanLotus 2017)

external_references.description: Erye Hernandez and Danny Tsechansky. (2017, June 22). The New and Improved macOS Backdoor from OceanLotus. Retrieved September 8, 2023.
